Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to enhance your daily life in numerous ways. With its innovative features and high-quality materials, it's truly a game-changer. Considering its exceptional value and benefits, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you today. For a limited time only, you can purchase this product for $75. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in yourself. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
